abstract: Berkshire Hathaway Inc reports re-acquisition of large stake in Phillips 66; Warren E Buffet's holding company had divested significant shares in oil refiner in early 2014, before drop in oil prices.
lead_paragraph: The company, led by Warren E. Buffett, on Friday disclosed a $4.48 billion stake, or roughly 10.8 percent of the stock, in the oil company Phillips 66.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway Takes Larger Stake in Phillips 66
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway Builds Stake in Oil Refiner

snippet: The company, led by Warren E. Buffett, on Friday disclosed a $4.48 billion stake, or roughly 10.8 percent of the stock, in the oil company Phillips 66.
